title: Trying to collect responses for a survey for a university project
selftext:
Hey everyone I'm trying to collect responses for my university project. I have sent it to all my friends and family but I still haven't got enough responses. Any ideas on how I can get a lot of responses? It's for understanding the traffic and parking situation in India's million-plus cities. Would be really helpful if you guys could fill out [this survey](https://forms.gle/MRgzquwKWUdaFjmA9) and/or suggest crazy ideas which can get me a few hundred responses. Thanks in advance 

[https://forms.gle/MRgzquwKWUdaFjmA9](https://forms.gle/MRgzquwKWUdaFjmA9)
